CustomField.description: Converts the Preferred Language field to a Culture code that can be used in Conga documents for translation and date formatting. https://tinyurl.com/y22t5gxr for details of the culture tag, which also formats currencies properly. Do not add to layouts. Use this field in URLs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to set the Culture flag in Conga URLs. To change this change the Preferred Language.
CustomField.label: Conga Culture Code
